speaker: Hollow Tree
lines: You find a cedar split by lightning with a hollow you can step into.
Char streaks run up the bark.
Resin beads glimmer in the light.
Inside, someone carved a small bed from the wood.
A ribbon of cloth holds a bent branch together.
The air smells sweet and sharp, like salve.
You find a twig bundle tucked in a knot.
You decide what to do with it.

choices.text: Burn the resin and watch the smoke.
Carve your own mark and keep walking.
